metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17973 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In LibTIFF 4.0.8, there is a heap-based use-after-free in the t2p_writeproc function in tiff2pdf.c. NOTE: there is a third-party report of inability to reproduce this issue.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this issue was disputed, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
